archimate:Product.name: OpenNLP
archimate:Product.documentation: http://opennlp.apache.org/ OpenNLP: It is hosted by the Apache Foundation, making it easy to integrate it into other Apache projects, like Apache Flink, Apache NiFi, and Apache Spark. It is a general NLP tool that covers all the common processing components of NLP, and it can be used from the command line or within an application as a library. It also has wide support for multiple languages. OpenNLP also includes maximum entropy and perceptron based machine learning.
